title: Fps problem since recent updates
body: Before that it was alright. Since 3 or 4 patches, I have experienced fps drop wich a quite frustrating. What is really awkward is that when I mess with the graphical settings a bit, everything goes back to normal.

replies.body:
That's pretty interesting. Are there specific settings that cause a big change, or is it sort of random? Framerate issues can be caused by a number of potential factors, however, the majority of these issues are caused by Display Driver or hardware issues. You can find a consolidated list of fixes in our [**FPS troubleshooting guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) so that working through those steps would be my suggestion.

Let me know if you have any further issues.
It very random, I didn't figure any specific settings for it to happen.
Gotcha. Well, let me know if you have any further incidents with your symptoms after working through that FPS Guide.
